headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. (BRO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Brown & Brown, Inc. on The Steady Investing’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BRO. Brown & Brown, Inc.’s share was trading at $69.53 as of February 12th. BRO’s trailing and forward P/E were 21.21 and 14.24 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Brown & Brown, Inc. (BRO) is the sixth-largest independent insurance brokerage in the U.S., operating primarily as an intermediary between insurers and customers, offering […]

headline: Raymond James Cuts Brown and Brown (BRO) Target by $8
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) is one of the 13 High-Quality S&P 500 Financial Stocks According to Hedge Funds. On February 17, 2026, Raymond James lowered the price target on Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) from $90 to $82 while keeping an Outperform rating on the shares. According to the analyst, insurance brokers and insurance-technology […]
